rows.label: tev001192_MSG0001
rows.name:
...Hmm? What am I doing? I'm playing with this cat.
I figured that was kind of obvious.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001192_MSG0002
rows.name:
Do I not seem like the animal-loving type to you?
Believe it or not, I had a pet Siamese on Earth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001192_MSG0003
rows.name:
On my days off, she would crawl onto my lap and let
me stroke her chin while I enjoyed a good book.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001192_MSG0004
rows.name:
Petting cats always reminds me of life on Earth.
What about you? Does interacting with pets
remind you of anything?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001192_JNK0010
rows.name: Nod

rows.label: tev001192_SEL0011
rows.name: Say it makes you suspect you had a pet on Earth.

rows.label: tev001192_JNK0020
rows.name: Shake Your Head

rows.label: tev001192_SEL0021
rows.name: Confess it doesn't remind you of anything special.

rows.label: tev001192_MSG0005
rows.name: Heh. Your face lights up when you talk about pets.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001192_MSG0006
rows.name: Such a powerful reaction to a lost memory...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001192_MSG0007
rows.name: I wonder if that means it's actually a returning memory?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001192_MSG0008
rows.name:
Hmm... Do you think pets could serve as a trigger to
recovering your other lost memories?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001192_MSG0009
rows.name:
Oh, right. Well, you did lose your memories in the
crash, after all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001192_MSG0010
rows.name:
I suppose it's possible that you did have pets and
simply don't remember, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001192_MSG0011
rows.name:
If so, perhaps pets could serve as a kind of trigger to
recovering your lost memories.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001192_MSG0012
rows.name:
Mind if I ask you another question?
Just as a matter of personal curiosity...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001192_MSG0013
rows.name: What animal do you think makes the best pet?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001192_JNK0030
rows.name: Cats

rows.label: tev001192_SEL0031
rows.name: Say you're a cat person.

rows.label: tev001192_JNK0040
rows.name: Dogs

rows.label: tev001192_SEL0041
rows.name: Say you're a dog person.

rows.label: tev001192_JNK0050
rows.name: Elma

rows.label: tev001192_SEL0051
rows.name: Say you're an Elma person.

rows.label: tev001192_MSG0014
rows.name:
Then we have that in common, huh? Their capricious
nature makes them seem like the quintessential Earth
creatures. I like that about them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001192_MSG0015
rows.name:
That Siamese I told you about? She had her good
days, but when she was in a foul mood, she would
scratch up everything I owned.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001192_MSG0016
rows.name:
At times like that, I think she was more dangerous
than any of Mira's indigens. Heh.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001192_MSG0017
rows.name: But...that's part of the reason I loved her so much.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001192_MSG0018
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001192_MSG0019
rows.name:
Er, sorry. I intended to help you recover a lost memory,
but just ended up spiraling down my own rabbit hole.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001192_MSG0020
rows.name:
Well, I enjoyed our conservation all the same.
Let's chat like this again sometime, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001192_MSG0021
rows.name:
That doesn't surprise me. You've always had a doglike
quality about you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001192_MSG0022
rows.name:
Oh, sorry—don't be mad! I know it sounds weird,
but I mean it as praise. Because as team leader,
I appreciate all of your...good-natured obedience.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001192_MSG0023
rows.name:
I hope I can continue to count on you loyally serving
our team and coming to our rescue when necessary.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001192_MSG0024
rows.name:
That's...interesting. You know I'm not a pet, right?
So why on earth would you even say that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001192_MSG0025
rows.name:
Perhaps this is another symptom of the damage your
mimeosome suffered in the crash.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001192_MSG0026
rows.name:
I'll make an appointment for you at the Mimeosome
Maintenance Center and request they perform a
disassembly so they can analyze your components.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001192_MSG0027
rows.name:
Oh, don't worry—it's a routine procedure for severe
mental damage. I'll personally make sure they do a
thorough job of cleaning out your skull.[ST:wait ]
